casebody.data:
CARTER-HUBBARD
v.
WRMC HOSPITAL. No. 411A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2006. John M. Logsdon, North Wilkesboro, for WRMC Hospital. John S. Willardson, Wilkesboro, for Carter-Hubbard Publishing. Mark W. Merritt, Blake W. Thomas, Charlotte, for CMHA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of October 2006 by NC Hospital Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of October 2006."
